reviewText: I like anything with Bela Lugosi in it! They could have had more of the robot in though.

Excellent serial.  I saw this several times on an afternoon TV kid's show when I was 8-10 years old.  The Grapevine DVD-R is the best version I have seen of the serial, though far from perfect.  I wish Universal would get the lead out and release this serial along with many of their other great serials on an updated and re-digitalized DVD.  Until then, try this Grapevine version.  I think it is satisfactory.
very good print-superior to vci. Lugosi is comfortable being Lugosi.  RobotFun flick. & gadgets were innovative in their day.
